cu.explanation_en: Setting mcc to 9999 is invalid as MCC must be a 3-digit number, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper PLMN setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 20 exceeds the maximum allowed value, causing configuration validation failure and preventing proper TDD slot configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 20 超過最大允許值，會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止正確的 TDD 時隙配置。
